channel.title: hugo on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Academic

item.title: Paper published in PAMI
item.description: Exciting news for Ram, Aleix and I. We got years worth of work published in IEEE PAMI.

item.title: New research published on PNAS
item.description: We’re very happy of having our research on color as an efficient mechanism for facial expressions published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Science.

item.title: Paper accepted for ICCV 2017
item.description: Our group is glad of having our paper “Recognition of Action Units in the Wild with Deep Nets and a New Global-Local” accepted to be presented in ICCV 2017.
